notes: The health talent increases maximum health capacity, and keeps the current health percentage.
The agility talent effectively grants Ursa 1.67 armor, 10 attack speed, and 10 attack damage.
Earthshock interrupts Ursa's channeling abilities upon cast.

Ursa leaps 250 range forwards when cast, 83 range high. While in the air, other units can pass below him. Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain. Leaps at a speed of 1000 for up to 0.25 seconds. During leap, Ursa can attack, cast abilities, use items, and turn.
Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain.
Leaps at a speed of 1000 for up to 0.25 seconds.
During leap, Ursa can attack, cast abilities, use items, and turn.
Earthshock is applied upon losing the leap buff. This means if the leap gets interrupted in any way, Earthshock is applied at Ursa's current location.
Earthshock first applies the debuff, then the damage.
With Aghanim's Shard, Ursa gains the Enrage buff based on its current level whenever Earthshock is cast. Does not provide dispel Ursa on cast, unlike Enrage.
Does not provide dispel Ursa on cast, unlike Enrage.
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
params: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on Ursa and reduces cooldown by 1 seconds.
Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.
The leap instantly ends when getting rooted. When cast while already rooted, results in an instant Earthshock at the current location.
The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
abilities.story: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

notes: Does not grant full attack speed. The provided attack speed can be negated by strong attack speed slows.
An attack charge is consumed whenever an attack is executed, regardless of outcome. This means missed attacks use up charges as well.
The number of charges left is visible on the buff icon.
Successive casts do not stack, but refresh the whole amount of charges instead.
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
params: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
abilities.story: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

notes: On each attack Fury Swipes first adds 1 stack and then deals damage based on the stack count. This means that the bonus damage is applied even with the first attack. There is no limit to the stacks.
This means that the bonus damage is applied even with the first attack.
There is no limit to the stacks.

The bonus damage is dealt in one instance together with the attack damage, and counts as attack damage as well. It can be lifestealed off of and cleaved, but it is not considered by crit. It is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
It can be lifestealed off of and cleaved, but it is not considered by crit.
It is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
Each successful attack refreshes the whole stack. Missed attacks neither place the buff, nor add a stack or refresh it.
The number of stacks is visible on the debuff icon placed on attacked units.
Does not work against buildings, wards and allied units when attacking them.
The stack duration increasing talent does not increase the duration against Roshan.
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 10 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
params: Prevents gaining new stacks. Already existing stacks still provide bonus attack damage.
In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
abilities.story: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

notes: Enrage interrupts Ursa's channeling abilities upon cast.
Applies a strong dispel on Ursa upon cast.
The 80% damage reduction reduces all 3 damage types. Does not reduce damage flagged as HP removal.
Does not reduce damage flagged as HP removal.
The status resistance stacks multiplicatively with other sources of status resistance.

With Aghanim's Scepter, Enrage can be cast while stunned, cycloned, slept, taunted, hidden or during forced movement. It still cannot be cast while silenced, hexed or prevented from acting. Ursa is unable to ⇧ Shift-queue this ability upon acquiring Aghanim's Scepter.
It still cannot be cast while silenced, hexed or prevented from acting.
Ursa is unable to ⇧ Shift-queue this ability upon acquiring Aghanim's Scepter.
Causes Ursa's model to glow red and increases its size by 20%. This has no impact on his collision size.
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.
params: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
abilities.story: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

description: Ulfsaar, the Ursa Warrior (or simply Ursa), is a melee agility hero whose abilities' main focus is the increase of attack damage, allowing for some of the most impressive sustained damage in the entire game.
history: Ulfsaar the warrior is the fiercest member of an ursine tribe, protective of his land and his people. During the long winters, while the mothers sleep and nurse their cubs, the males patrol the lands above—as tireless, vigilant defenders of their ancient ways. Hearing dim but growing rumors of a spreading evil, Ulfsaar headed out beyond the boundaries of his wild wooded homeland, intending to track down and destroy the threat at its source, before it could endanger his people. He is a proud creature with a bright strong spirit, utterly trustworthy, a staunch ally and defender.
